title: Directions: Instructions (Usefulness 8)
description: Traveler usefulness 8/10 phrases for the Instructions subcategory within Directions. Includes 8 card(s).

cards.english: Turn right at the dead end.
cards.japanese: 突き当たりで右に曲がる。

cards.english: Go straight until the second traffic signal.
cards.romaji: Futatsume no shingo made massugu susumu.
cards.japanese: 二つ目の信号までまっすぐ進む。

cards.english: Turn right at the fourth traffic signal.
cards.romaji: Yottsu-me no shingo de migi ni magarimasu.
cards.japanese: 四つ目の信号で右に曲がります。

cards.english: Go straight until the fifth corner.
cards.japanese: 五つ目の角まで進みます。

cards.english: Turn left at the first traffic signal.
cards.romaji: Hitotsu-me no shingo wo hidari ni magarimasu.
cards.japanese: 一つ目の信号を左に曲がります。
そして、まっすぐ行きます。

cards.english: Then turn left at the third traffic signal.
cards.romaji: Sanban-me no shingo wo hidari ni magarimasu.
cards.japanese: 三番目の信号を左に曲がります。

cards.english: Turn right at the dead end.
cards.romaji: Tsuki atari de migi ni magaru.
cards.japanese: 突き当たりで右に曲がる。
